required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Vehicle-Controlled Study of SkQ1 as Treatment for Dry-eye Syndrome
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 3, Multi-Center, Randomized, Double-Masked, Placebo-Controlled Study of Safety and Efficacy of SkQ1 Ophthalmic Solution in the Environment and the Controlled Adverse Environmental (CAE®) Model for the Treatment of Dry Eye Syndrome

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate whether SkQ1 Ophthalmic Solution is safe and effective compared to Vehicle for the treatment of the signs and symptoms of dry eye syndrome.

detailed_description.textblock:
Multi-center, double-masked, randomized, placebo-controlled study comprising 5 visits over the course of approximately 9 weeks. Qualified subjects are randomized 1:1 to receive either SkQ1 Ophthalmic Solution, or Placebo (vehicle of SkQ1 Ophthalmic Solution).
The Primary Endpoints are:
Change from Baseline (Visit 2) to Visit 5 of Ocular Discomfort;
Change from Baseline (Visit 2) to Visit 5 of conjunctival fluorescein staining (sum of temporal and nasal regions)

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Parallel Assignment Parallel-group study SkQ1 Ophthalmic Solution versus placebo (vehicle) solution
study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.description: Change of Conjunctival Fluroscein Staining (sum of temporal and nasal regions)

secondary_outcome.description: Change from Baseline of Ocular Discomfort on Day 29
Change from baseline of conjunctival fluorescein staining (sum of temporal and nasal regions) to Day 43

secondary_outcome.measure: Tear Film Breakup Time During Controlled Adverse Environment (CAE®)
secondary_outcome.description: Tear film break-up time pre- to post-CAE®
Change from baseline of corneal fluorescein staining in central region on Day 29

facility.name: Arizona Eye Institute and Cosmetic Laser
